java/liquibase/change/AlterSequenceChange.java

00001 package liquibase.change;
00002 
00003 import liquibase.database.Database;
00004 import liquibase.database.sql.AlterSequenceStatement;
00005 import liquibase.database.sql.SqlStatement;
00006 import liquibase.database.structure.DatabaseObject;
00007 import liquibase.database.structure.Sequence;
00008 import liquibase.exception.UnsupportedChangeException;
00009 import org.w3c.dom.Document;
00010 import org.w3c.dom.Element;
00011 
00012 import java.util.Arrays;
00013 import java.util.HashSet;
00014 import java.util.Set;
00015 
00019 public class AlterSequenceChange extends AbstractChange {
00020 
00021     private String schemaName;
00022     private String sequenceName;
00023     private Integer incrementBy;
00024     private Integer maxValue;
00025     private Integer minValue;
00026     private Boolean ordered;
00027     // StartValue is not allowed since we cannot alter the starting sequence number
00028 
00029     public AlterSequenceChange() {
00030         super("alterSequence", "Alter Sequence");
00031     }
00032 
00033     public String getSchemaName() {
00034         return schemaName;
00035     }
00036 
00037     public void setSchemaName(String schemaName) {
00038         this.schemaName = schemaName;
00039     }
00040 
00041     public String getSequenceName() {
00042         return sequenceName;
00043     }
00044 
00045     public void setSequenceName(String sequenceName) {
00046         this.sequenceName = sequenceName;
00047     }
00048 
00049 
00050     public Integer getIncrementBy() {
00051         return incrementBy;
00052     }
00053 
00054     public void setIncrementBy(Integer incrementBy) {
00055         this.incrementBy = incrementBy;
00056     }
00057 
00058     public Integer getMaxValue() {
00059         return maxValue;
00060     }
00061 
00062     public void setMaxValue(Integer maxValue) {
00063         this.maxValue = maxValue;
00064     }
00065 
00066     public Integer getMinValue() {
00067         return minValue;
00068     }
00069 
00070     public void setMinValue(Integer minValue) {
00071         this.minValue = minValue;
00072     }
00073 
00074     public Boolean isOrdered() {
00075         return ordered;
00076     }
00077 
00078     public void setOrdered(Boolean ordered) {
00079         this.ordered = ordered;
00080     }
00081 
00082     public SqlStatement[] generateStatements(Database database) throws UnsupportedChangeException {
00083         if (!database.supportsSequences()) {
00084             throw new UnsupportedChangeException("Sequences do not exist in "+database.getProductName());
00085         }
00086 
00087         return new SqlStatement[] {
00088                 new AlterSequenceStatement(getSchemaName() == null?database.getDefaultSchemaName():getSchemaName(), getSequenceName())
00089                 .setIncrementBy(getIncrementBy())
00090                 .setMaxValue(getMaxValue())
00091                 .setMinValue(getMinValue())
00092                 .setOrdered(isOrdered())
00093         };
00094     }
00095 
00096     public String getConfirmationMessage() {
00097         return "Sequence " + getSequenceName() + " altered";
00098     }
00099 
00100     public Element createNode(Document currentChangeLogFileDOM) {
00101         Element node = currentChangeLogFileDOM.createElement("alterSequence");
00102         node.setAttribute("sequenceName", getSequenceName());
00103         if (getSchemaName() != null) {
00104             node.setAttribute("schemaName", getSchemaName());
00105         }
00106         if (getMinValue() != null) {
00107             node.setAttribute("minValue", getMinValue().toString());
00108         }
00109         if (getMaxValue() != null) {
00110             node.setAttribute("maxValue", getMaxValue().toString());
00111         }
00112         if (getIncrementBy() != null) {
00113             node.setAttribute("incrementBy", getIncrementBy().toString());
00114         }
00115         if (isOrdered() != null) {
00116             node.setAttribute("ordered", isOrdered().toString());
00117         }
00118 
00119         return node;
00120     }
00121 
00122     public Set<DatabaseObject> getAffectedDatabaseObjects() {
00123         Sequence dbObject = new Sequence();
00124         dbObject.setName(sequenceName);
00125 
00126         return new HashSet<DatabaseObject>(Arrays.asList(dbObject));
00127     }
00128 }
